summary:
Natasha Romanoff x reader
Bars were not your things. Your girlfriend had dragged you here and abandoned you for no more than 5...
body:
Natasha Romanoff x reader

Bars were not your things. Your girlfriend had dragged you here and abandoned you for no more than 5 minutes to go get drinks. Unfortunately, some people took this as an opportunity.

“Did it hurt?” oh god. Here we go again.

“Did what hurt?” Why are you playing along with this?

“When you fell from Heaven.” So predictable.

“No, but it did hurt when I climbed out of hell.” That was good. Considering you don’t like bars, you’re well equipped with comebacks. By this point, a reasonable person would realise that their advances are not wanted and would leave. Yet again, you’ve found yourself in an unfortunate position.

“Well, I do like a bad bitch.”

“I’m sorry, I don’t have a dog.” If looks could kill, you’d be more than 6 feet under.

“I’m not kinkshaming” you need to stop talking. Now.

“I sure would like to know your kinks.” The demon flirter never quits.

“Dominant women. That’s all the information you’re going to get.” Hallelujah, Nat to the rescue! The demon flirter wondered away with a scowl and a sour look. The relief must have shown on your face, as she laughed while passing you your drink.

“Is this why you don’t go to bars?” She asked as she slid into the seat next to you. You hung your head as you nodded, morose. She grinned wolfishly.

“You want to go and… enjoy that kink of yours?” You’ve never nodded so fast in your life.

summary: Great question! Sometimes it's easier to tell than others. A lot of movie and TV wigs are outstanding--think Game of Thrones....
body:
Great question! Sometimes it’s easier to tell than others. A lot of movie and TV wigs are outstanding–think Game of Thrones. But the giveaways are when someone’s hairline looks just a bit too full at the front, or the part is too severe and/or perfect, or again, looks just slightly too full, or their overall hair is just very dense. Most people have sparse or uneven hairlines that are hard to fake, even with an excellent lace-front wig. (And this goes, too, for people with naturally thick hair. The hairline is always the thinnest part, and the part of your hair will always look a little thinner along the edges, rather than going from a knife-straight part to boom, dense hair.)

Of course, the biggest giveaway is if the shape of the person’s head at the back or top looks not quite right, although that’s often hidden in post through the wonders of movie magic. But I’ve worn many a wig in my day and can recognize one when I see it!

The two most common and effective methods of installing a wig or hairpiece are either to glue it down and use makeup to hide the lace, or set the wig slightly behind the natural hairline so the front is the person’s actual hair. From there you line up the part of your hair with that of the wig, then use makeup or temporary colour to match the wig. The method all depends on what kind of hairstyle it is, or if it’s a closeup shot, etc. Hair without a part automatically has to be glued down in front, for instance, because there’s nothing you can blend it with to make it look natural, and no part to line up.

In TWS you can see they used both methods on Scarlett:

The wig is behind her natural hairline here. The front of her hair is slightly lighter in colour (because she’s naturally blonde, and they coloured the front bits of her hair copper) and less dense, and you can see the line where the wig is darker and fuller. It also looks really full toward the back of the crown where most people’s hair tends to naturally lie more flat unless they’ve backcombed the shit out of it.

In this picture you can see the slight line of the lace at the hairline, if you look closely. I’m certain they glued the wig down here because her hair matches more uniformly in colour, and it looks more dense at the hairline than in the first picture.

For comparison, here’s Scarlett’s natural hairline:

It’s more uneven and has some sparse areas, not because she’s losing hair, but because people just don’t tend to have the hairline a wig creates. Especially people who use a lot of styling tools on their hair–mechanical damage can often thin the hair in front, or leave more baby hairs.

But the most telling giveaway is in the BTS shots, like this one.

The colour and shape of it just don’t look natural at all, especially at the back. It’s too full and kind of sticks out farther than the line of her skull because her natural hair is stuffed underneath, creating a bump. That is obviously a wig.

You can see it’s a wig in Ultron as well. Almost identical hairstyle to what she had in Avengers 1, above, but the hairline is totally different–too perfect, too uniformly dense where it should be uneven and wispy in places. She was pregnant here, so it makes sense that she wouldn’t be dyeing her hair.

For what it’s worth, I think it’s totally reasonable for Scarlett to have switched to wearing wigs for her MCU films. Red is a bitch to get out of blonde hair (I speak from experience), and I wouldn’t want to deal with having to bleach it out four times after every film. That’s hard on the hair.

And another thing: if you thought Chris Evans wasn’t wearing a frontal (wig) in Infinity War… think again. Cap’s mad flow was more unnatural than the CGI they did for Proxima Midnight. It suited him, but Chris Evans does NOT have that hairline. Girlfriend only wishes she did.

Even when he’s wearing a similar longer hairstyle, you can see his hairline comes to more of a gentle point and is slightly more sparse. Men’s hair especially tends to do this more as they age, going thinner at the temples first and creating a more pronounced shape at the front of the hair.

The H&MU team almost nailed it, but not quite (and they nailed it on some days more than others, because his hairline changes in the movie, going from natural looking at times, with that gentle peak, to too-straight and fake). It also shortens his forehead a little. Not that he’s got a fivehead, but it’s not that small, and his hair isn’t as thick at the temples like in the photo below:

They gave him a fake beard for reshoots too, but that’s another post entirely.

They done you dirty there, Chris.

Anyway, hope that answered your question and gave you some insight! There are some really fantastic YouTube videos out there about applying lace-front wigs to make them look more natural. It’s a fascinating process and some people are mind-blowingly good at it. I am not one of those people. The first time I met @formerlyfebricant I got loudly called out by a drag queen for wearing a wig (I was going through a tough hair transition period, okay), and it haunts me to this day. She literally called me Wig all night in front of a packed bar. And that’s the story of how I know about what gives away a bad hairpiece.

In this picture you can see the slight line of the lace at the hairline, if you look closely. I’m certain they glued the wig down here because her hair matches more uniformly in colour, and it looks more dense at the hairline than in the first picture.

For comparison, here’s Scarlett’s natural hairline:

It’s more uneven and has some sparse areas, not because she’s losing hair, but because people just don’t tend to have the hairline a wig creates. Especially people who use a lot of styling tools on their hair–mechanical damage can often thin the hair in front, or leave more baby hairs.

But the most telling giveaway is in the BTS shots, like this one.

The colour and shape of it just don’t look natural at all, especially at the back. It’s too full and kind of sticks out farther than the line of her skull because her natural hair is stuffed underneath, creating a bump. That is obviously a wig.

You can see it’s a wig in Ultron as well. Almost identical hairstyle to what she had in Avengers 1, above, but the hairline is totally different–too perfect, too uniformly dense where it should be uneven and wispy in places. She was pregnant here, so it makes sense that she wouldn’t be dyeing her hair.

For what it’s worth, I think it’s totally reasonable for Scarlett to have switched to wearing wigs for her MCU films. Red is a bitch to get out of blonde hair (I speak from experience), and I wouldn’t want to deal with having to bleach it out four times after every film. That’s hard on the hair.

And another thing: if you thought Chris Evans wasn’t wearing a frontal (wig) in Infinity War… think again. Cap’s mad flow was more unnatural than the CGI they did for Proxima Midnight. It suited him, but Chris Evans does NOT have that hairline. Girlfriend only wishes she did.

Even when he’s wearing a similar longer hairstyle, you can see his hairline comes to more of a gentle point and is slightly more sparse. Men’s hair especially tends to do this more as they age, going thinner at the temples first and creating a more pronounced shape at the front of the hair.

The H&MU team almost nailed it, but not quite (and they nailed it on some days more than others, because his hairline changes in the movie, going from natural looking at times, with that gentle peak, to too-straight and fake). It also shortens his forehead a little. Not that he’s got a fivehead, but it’s not that small, and his hair isn’t as thick at the temples like in the photo below:

They gave him a fake beard for reshoots too, but that’s another post entirely.

They done you dirty there, Chris.

Anyway, hope that answered your question and gave you some insight! There are some really fantastic YouTube videos out there about applying lace-front wigs to make them look more natural. It’s a fascinating process and some people are mind-blowingly good at it. I am not one of those people. The first time I met @formerlyfebricant I got loudly called out by a drag queen for wearing a wig (I was going through a tough hair transition period, okay), and it haunts me to this day. She literally called me Wig all night in front of a packed bar. And that’s the story of how I know about what gives away a bad hairpiece.

summary: Finally Found My Way
body:
Finally Found My Way

Part 8

Warning: language, anxiety, violence, sexual assault

Summary: After four years of being tortured by hydra, you were finally back, yours powers stronger than ever. But that was not all.

Word Count: 4.3K

Josh was the only thing you were looking forward too when you woke up. Ever since your date, Josh has been doing something new with you everyday. You were mad a Bucky though. He refused to let you come along on missions, he even convinced the rest of the team somehow to agree on this. Even Peter! You were tired of this and spent most of your time with Josh instead.

Bucky ended up telling the team about the nightmares. Tony had the worst reaction, he isolated himself for two days, destroyed his room in the process. How could he not have seen this. He was your father, how could he have missed this. But Natasha helped him get through it telling him not to comfort you, knowing you would push them away if they did. Steve was in shock, he knew it happened ONCE, you told him it only happened once and they stopped. You told him. He should’ve pushed up to tell him, he should’ve done more. Clint and Bruce couldn’t even process the information. Wanda cried, Vision held her. Sam was broken. Everyone knew, but no one could do anything.

Three weeks. Three weeks since you’ve been on a mission but also three weeks you and Josh have been dating . And it was amazing. He held your hand in the hallways, kissed you by the lockers, walked you to every class, took you to lunch after school, if you weren’t busy, and he would make you feel so special.

That was until he started becoming a little distant, it was Wednesday, and he barely talked to you after you guys hung out Sunday. He said he was busy. You were fine. Everything was fine. You know not to get attached to things, especially people. You hadn’t fully trusted Josh and he hasn’t fully trusted you so it’s fine to have too spend some days just for yourself. That was until Wednesday in the cafeteria. You were talking to Mj and Ned who were sitting on either side of you, Flash and Peter were talking about the Spanish quiz tomorrow, they were sitting in front of you.

“You guys wanna do a Star Wars marathon this Friday?” Ned asked with a huge smile.

“Sure, I’m free.” MJ says, then looking at you , so you could respond.

“I’m pretty sure I’m free too.” You say, you loved spending time with your friends.  You turn to Peter and Flash. “You guys in?” They weren’t looking at you, and they weren’t talking, they were actually staring in shock at what was behind you. Ned turns behind to see what was happening and quickly looks between Peter and Flash. They both shake there heads ‘no’. “What’s wrong?” You say turning to see what they were looking at. But before you could see anything, Peter jumps over the table standing in front of you, so you could only see his chest. “What’s up Peter, move.” You were annoyed and confused at why he suddenly moved to block your path. You stand up, trying to get Peter to move. It was getting annoying. “Peter, what the fuck, just move.” Flash comes by Peter holding your shoulders.

“Y/N, it-its not a big deal.” Flash says, sadness covered his face and so did Peter’s face.

“If it’s not a big deal then why can’t I see.” Peter and Flash both stood side by side blocking your view. That’s it, you pushed both of them to the side, using a little force from your powers, (the energy in your powers could make you stronger when you wanted too). But you instantly regretted it. There he was. Josh, his hands around another girls shoulder, they were making out, for a long time. The whole entire cafeteria fell silent, when they saw Y/N Stark standing in shock with her two friends not knowing what to do. The silence caught Josh’s attention, he made eye contact with you. You didn’t know what you were feeling. You could feel the heat rising in your hands. Peter saw you tense, and he looked down at your hands, they were starting to light up. He quickly moved past Flash, taking your hands in his. You didn’t move. Your eyes were still locked on Josh’s. Josh was frozen. He knew he fucked up big time. He got out of his table and started walking towards you.

“Y/N, its-its not what it looks like, let me explain-” He was about to reach for your shoulder, but Peter was quick to turn around and punch him. knocking him to the floor as he grabbed his eye. Peter was going to go for another punch until he felt Flash holding him back.

“Not here man- not here.” Flash whispers to Peter, pushing him back to you. You still hadn’t moved. You were still trying to figure out what your were feeling. Peter on the other hand knew exactly what he felt, anger. He knew this would happen, he knew Josh wouldn’t treat you like you wanted him too. He could feel his blood boiling. When he saw Josh standing up and making his way to him, Peter was just about ready to kill the guy until Flash stepped in. He pushed Josh back. “Get the fuck away from here, before you start something you regret dumbass.” Flash pushes Josh back. Peter was standing in front of you, Flash was defending you, Mj was holding your hand and Ned was rubbing your back, the cafeteria was staring, some people were even filming it. It was too much. That’s one thing you knew. You can’t be here. You can’t be here.

You push past everyone heading for the door leaving your bag and phone and everything, your only focus was on getting out of there. You ran down the hall, pushing the schools front doors open as Peter chased you down the hall, calling your name. But you ignored it, the sound muffled as a million things raced through your head. You unchained your bike and quickly rode out of the school onto the busy streets of NYC, leaving Peter standing in front of the school, pulling at his hair.

-

-

-

You didn’t stop, you kept riding, you went straight, right, left, anywhere, anywhere that wasn’t there. You finally get to the edge of New York City. You were by the ocean, you don’t know which park this was, and you didn’t care. At least no one was here. You dropped your bike by the sand and sat down by the ocean . And you looked out.

The waves crashing down, as the wind breezed through your hair. The sun beating on your face. You lay your head back on the sand, as you closed your eyes soaking up the sun and its heat. You weren’t crying, you weren’t yelling, you weren’t feeling. Your closed. Your done.

You watched the sun set, admiring the beautiful colors in the sky. You forgot about time and day. You just watched the sun. That’s it. Nothing else was in your head, Just the sun. The sun now over the arisen, stars started to pop up in the sky and you focused on that then. You looked for the constellations that you remembered as a kid. Your dad use to take you to the roof of the Stark Tower, when it was the Stark Tower, and he would lay a blanket and you guys would just lay there finding constellations. It’s been years since you sat quietly and looked for constellations. You then fell asleep looking up at the night sky.

“Fuck. You.” you say. Staring the man dead in the eye. He goes for another punch, this time to the face. You take the hit and spit the blood out on the side. You were tied down to a chair, your wrists and legs bound to the chair, with the ‘handcuffs’. You couldn’t break from them no matter how much energy you tried to release, it wouldn’t d even let your fingertips heat up.

“This will keep going, the more you resist, the more you disobey, the more pain we’ll cause. Simple as that.” The man says, going over to the table behind him grabbing another tool. Hey presses it against your naked stomach, only wearing a bra and panties. You bit your lip in pain, not wanting him to feel the satisfaction in your cries, you smell the burning flesh and you can feel your skin bubbling. He retracks the tool, you breathe out, taking in deep breathes.

This wasn’t new for you, you acted out, you shouldn’t have, but you did. They killed your cell neighbor the only person you could take too at night. You guys spent the nights talking about your old lives. Even though there was a wall between you guys, you still cared about him. He was like an older brother to you, he usually stopped the guard’s from touching you. He got most of them away, but not all of them. At night a few guard’s would come into your cell and touch you, and sexually assault you. You would cry out in pain as Wade screamed from his cell for them to stop. His name was Wade Wilson, he made your days there better, with his funny as hell jokes and random commentary. The day they took him down to the basement and never returned him you knew what they did.    

The man placed the tool down and picked up the needle. Your eyes wide and you started to shake your head violently. They gave you those needles often, and they were the worst pain ever. “No, no please. Please, one more chance please just don’t-” before you could finish your sentence, the needle made contact with your skin, the blue liquid entering your bloodstream. The pain coursed through your body and your scream erupted.

Your body shots up, your hand coming to your chest feeling your heart beating at lighting speed. You look up to see the sun rising, you start taking deep breathes, focusing on the sun, trying to relax your mind. You rub your eyes, as you look around. There were a few people passing by staring at you, some taking pictures of Y/N Stark sleeping on the sand. You ignore it though, your eyes moving back to the sun.

You wait until the sun has fully risen, until you start to push yourself onto your feet. You pat some of the sand off you, as you pick your bike up, swinging your leg over the seat and start peddling. You pass by the cars, and yelling people making there way to work.

The Avenger’s compound then comes into view and you keep pedaling until you rest your bike against the wall and walk in. You kick your shoes off, you make your way to the comman area to get to your room. You find everyone suited up yelling at each other. You ignore it, you see your bag on the floor and go over to pick it up and you start to make your way to your room. No one seemed to notice you until

“She’s back.” Peter says, sighing in relief. Everyone turns around to see you walking away. Tony pushes through everyone and calls your name out.

“Y/N, Y/N!” but you continue to walk, not wanting to deal with this right now. “Y/N where were you! We were going to send out everyone to look for you! Hey!” Your eyes are focused on the hallway. You finally make it to your room and slam it shut, tapping the screen next to the door so the door locks. You hear your dads footsteps finally making it to your room. He goes to turn the knob to find it locked. “Y/N-Y/N! Open the door!” You drop your bag on the floor and look to your clock on 12:45pm. You make your way to the bathroom washing your face. You still hear the banging on your door and your dad calling your name from behind it.

Steve makes his way down the hall to see an angry Tony banging on your door, yelling your name. He comes over and places a hand on his shoulder. “Leave her. She’ll come out-” Tony cuts Steve off.

“No, she fucking disappeared from the school, she didn’t even come home. Where the fuck was she! For all I knew she could’ve been taken! S-she could’ve been l-lying dead somewhere.” Tony couldn’t even get the words out before a sob left his mouth. Steve looked at Tony, his heart shattering to a million pieces to see his friend in this state. The only person that could make him like this was you. He thought you were dead. Steve dragged Tony to his office, not wanting the rest of the team to see Tony like this. Tony went to his scotch pouring himself a drink and taking a swing. Steve let it happen, he knew Tony went through a lot today.

-

-

-

You went to your closet about two hours later, pulling on a pair of sports shorts, and sports bra and throwing a tank-top over it. You put your Nikes on and grab your gym bag as you leave your room. The compound was silent, but you didn’t care. Your face expressionless, your heart feeling cold as ice. You couldn’t feel anything. You made your way to the training room.

The training room was practically a gym, there was a huge mat placed at the center, where you guys often spared each other in. There were weights around the edge, and boxing bags lined in a row, there were other equipment as well. You go to the bleachers dropping your bag down and opening the bag. You take out your boxing tap and you start wrapping them around your hands.

“FRIDAY play my workout playlist.” You yell. FRIDAY plays the music, it echos through the gym walls. You tell FRIDAY to higher the volume, so that’s the only thing you could hear. You move to the boxing bag, and you start punching. Your punches becoming stronger with each throw, all the anger you kept in starting to leak out. And you let it.

Your hands starting to heat up and they started to glow, with one last punch you send the bag flying across the room. You move to grab another bag, hanging it up and continuing. You don’t know how long you’ve been in the training room, until you hear someone speak from behind you.

“Wanna talk about it.” Steve. You continue punching the bag.

“No- theres - nothing - too - talk - about!” The bag flies across the room. You go over and hang up another bag. Steve looks around the room noticing about twenty bags laying around the room. Steve knew you don’t like talking about shit like that so he did what he knew you’d agree on doing.

“Ok… how about we take break from boxing, and spare?” Your punches hesitated, knowing what he was trying to do. You continue punching the bag. “C’mon Y/N, me and you. You haven’t been on the field for awhile. Let’s see what you’ve got.” You stopped your punches holding the bag so it wouldn’t swing back and hit you. You turn around, Steve notices the anger in your eyes. He could see your hands balled in fists. He’s never seen you like this. And it scared him a little.

“And who’s fault is that, Huh?! Oh yea it was everyone’s ! All of you said I couldn’t go on missions anymore!” You unwrap the tape around your hands and throw them behind you, making your way to the mat, in the middle of the room. You stand in the middle putting your hands up in guard. “You wanna see what I’ve got, c’mon. I’m ready!” Steve hesitated a bit, this wasn’t such a good idea. When sparing, it’s usually hand to hand combat meaning no powers. Rules were don’t kill each other and if the other person says stop it’s over. Other than that, everything else is fine.

“Remember the rules?” Steve says making his way to you. He just wanted to make sure you weren’t going to kill him.

“Yes, I know the fucking rules!” You spat, annoyed with absolutely everything at this point. Steve brushed off your attitude and nodded his head. Steve stands in front of you putting his hands up in guard.

“Ok, lets go.” You were quick to through the first punch, which was not like you, you get Steve right in jaw. Steve hesitates a bit, taken aback by the sudden anger filling you. You and Steve go back an forth, Steve was mostly on defensive not wanting to hurt you when your in this state. People started coming into the room taking a seat on the bleachers. You caught a few people from the corner of your eye, Peter, Clint and Nat were sitting in the first row, Sam and Rhodey behind them, Wanda came in shortly after and not surprising Vision comes in behind her. You then notice Bucky enter , but ignore him, still annoyed about what he did. But you didn’t focus on them, it was only on Steve. The more punches and kicks you threw the more you grew angry. Your blood was boiling. When Steve makes you loose your balance, falling on your back, you let out a grunt. Steve jogs up to you ready to pick you up.

“Don’t touch me!” you say pushing his hands away and standing up quickly going back to guard. “Let’s go.” Steve looks at your fists, your nails digging into your palms. He shakes his head ‘no’. “What?!” You say frustrated. It was his damn idea.

“I’m done Y/N. Lets take a break-” You turn away from Steve and face the bleachers.

You raise your hands up, “Anyone care to spare!” You yell eyeing everyone. They all exchange looks, they could see your distressed figure, but if this was the only way you wanted to communicate then so be it. Sam was the first to stand up. He makes his way to you rolling up his sleeves. “Ok…Lets go” Steve nods at Sam, and you guys start fighting. You and Sam go back and forth for about thirty minutes, it was long. Until Sam notices how this wasn’t any good and you catch him off guard knocking him off his feet, his back hitting the floor. “C’mon, get up.” Sam rolls over standing back up.

“I’m done Y/N” you roll your eyes and turn back to the bleachers.

“Who’s next!” Clint stands up making his way to you. Clint often trained you, most of your fight combinations you learned were from him. You nod your head, Steve calls it and you guys start fighting. Every hit fueled your anger, every punch you threw was building up your anger and frustration. You just wanted to let go, but you couldn’t. You pushed through it, and kept fighting. Clint knocked you and you stubbled back, but not completely falling. Clint calls it though. Wanda takes his place. She then drops and Vision comes in. After Vision. Bucky then offers to fight. “No.” Everyone looks at you, you said you wanted to fight. You did but not Bucky. Bucky silently sat back down.

By the time you got to Nat, you wouldn’t even look anyone in the eye, your head feeling like it was going to explode. Your hands were up ready to start fighting Nat, but Steve quickly grabs your hands. You look up at him your eyebrows furrowed. “What?!” You say struggling to get out of his grip. 

“No. Powers.” He said, you look down at your hands, they were about to let an energy ball out. You nodd your head.

“Yea I know. Sorry. I’m fine. Let. go.” You say not loosing your stern voice. Steve lets go backing up. He yells start, Nat throws the first kick, and you guys fight. You always hated fighting Nat and Steve, they were always the hardest, and they fueled you up. they knocked you down and got you questioning every move, making you more and more angry. Nat knocks you to the floor for the sixth time, finally making it the last. “What?!” you say standing up wiping the faint blood trickling down your forehead.

“Your bleeding Y/N. I’m not gonna fight you. You need a break.” Nat says making her way to you, but you back up not letting her touch you. 

You scoff, “ I don’t need shit. If you don’t wanna fight get off the mat!” You spat turning your back and looking at the bleachers for what seemed like the thousandth time. “So! Who’s next!” you yelled annoyed that they haven’t gotten the message that someone has to be on the mat with her. 

“Me,” you look down seeing Peter making his way towards you. You square up on the mat. 

“Ok”, You don’t dare look Peter in the eye, avoiding his gaze at all costs. Steve calls it and you start. You throw a punch and kick missing both times, this went on for awhile, Peter didn’t get hit once and he didn’t dare hit you, not wanting to cause you any kind of pain. All he did was dodge and you were the one trying to get him. It was getting you more worked up. “Stop dodging! Fucking hit me Peter!” You yell, Peter ignores your request and continues dodging each punch and kick. Until you lost it. You didn’t know what came over you, it was like your breaking point and you couldn’t control it. The huge energy ball came out of nowhere hurdling towards Peter. Steve was quick to grab Nat and pull her down, everyone else dropped to the floor taking shelter. You looked up seeing a huge hole in the wall. “oh my god.” You ran towards the wall, looking through it, you got out walking outside to see pieces of the wall scattered around the field. You looked around for Peter. “PETER!” Your breathing quickened, you gasped for air. “PETER!” Before you knew it there was a tap on your shoulder and you wipe your head around and see Peters face. He sensed the energy ball coming towards him and he quickly latched on the ceiling dodging the energy. You threw yourself at Peter. “I’m sorry, Peter I’m so so sorry, oh my god-” Peter wrapped on arm around your waist and the other stroked your hair as you held him with your life. 

“I’m fine Y/N, I’m fine.” You pulled away, you felt the tears prickling your eyes. NO YOU CAN’T LET GO YOU CAN’T! You looked at Peter, he noticed your glassy eyes. He brought one hand up to your cheek. “I’m okay Y/N” he said softly, with a reassuring smile. And thats when you lost it, your body fell numb as your body collapsed, Peter wrapped his hand around your waist and fell to the ground with you. He hugged you on the ground as you let go. Your tears soaked up his shirt. 

“I-I can’t, I can’t, I-It hurts Peter. It hurts so bad.” You sobbed, as all the feelings you kept locked up for the past five years came out. The tears ran down your face like a waterfall, it wouldn’t stop. And you felt a weight being lifted off your shoulder. Peter stroked your back and just brought you closer to his body. “P-peter, Im so sorry. I-I can’t” You soaked up in his shirt, grabbing everything he was giving you. 

“I-It’s okay Y/N,” He kissed the side of your head. You couldn’t breathe, you pulled back trying to gasp for hair. Peters hand flys up to your face, stroking your cheek bones. He looks You in the eye and says “Let it go,” and thats exactly what you did. You yelled out in pain as Peter held you close. The rest of the team watched from afar, they held each other watching you cry on Peters shoulder. All there hearts breaking at the amount of pain you’ve kept in, a 16 year old girl, there 16 year old girl should not be holding that much pain and that’s when they finally realized everything you’ve went through. Nat and Wanda were silently crying as the guys choked back there tears. Peter soon started to feel the tears running down his cheeks. He continued to hold you as you felt the world beating you down. 

After what seemed like a hours, everyone had gone inside awhile ago giving you space. You were just breathing heavy, having felt like you had no more tears to let out. Your eyes were red and puffy. Your head rested on Peters shoulder, your body in a tight ball on Peters lap. You soon fell asleep on his shoulder. It was already night time, so Peter picks you up and makes his way to your room. He passes by the team, Steve was talking to Tony, when Tony’s eye caught your torn down body in Peter’s arms. Peter could tell Tony had been crying… and drinking for awhile. The team noticed your sleeping figure and didn’t dare make a sound. Except for Tony, he made his way to Peter, he halted his stance, no letting go of you, afraid to wake you up. Tony stood in front of Peter, looking down at his daughter. He pushed a few strands of hair from your face, placing a kiss on your forehead, before stepping out of the way, nodding to Peter. 

Peter carefully placed you on your bed, he tucked you under the blankets. Before he could walk away from the bed you grabbed his wrist. He looks down at you, “Stay.” you say weakly. Peter gives you a soft smile nodding his head. You slide over, making room for Peter. Peter pulls the blanket above both your bodies. You slide closer to him resting you head on his chest, taking in his scent. Peter wrapped his arm around your waist pulling you closer. You let out a sigh and fall into a deep sleep. Peter rubs small circles on your waist until he too falls asleep.  

-

-

-

A/N: I hope you guys liked Part 8,

Part 9 coming soon!

“Y/N, its-its not what it looks like, let me explain-” He was about to reach for your shoulder, but Peter was quick to turn around and punch him. knocking him to the floor as he grabbed his eye. Peter was going to go for another punch until he felt Flash holding him back.

“Not here man- not here.” Flash whispers to Peter, pushing him back to you. You still hadn’t moved. You were still trying to figure out what your were feeling. Peter on the other hand knew exactly what he felt, anger. He knew this would happen, he knew Josh wouldn’t treat you like you wanted him too. He could feel his blood boiling. When he saw Josh standing up and making his way to him, Peter was just about ready to kill the guy until Flash stepped in. He pushed Josh back. “Get the fuck away from here, before you start something you regret dumbass.” Flash pushes Josh back. Peter was standing in front of you, Flash was defending you, Mj was holding your hand and Ned was rubbing your back, the cafeteria was staring, some people were even filming it. It was too much. That’s one thing you knew. You can’t be here. You can’t be here.

You push past everyone heading for the door leaving your bag and phone and everything, your only focus was on getting out of there. You ran down the hall, pushing the schools front doors open as Peter chased you down the hall, calling your name. But you ignored it, the sound muffled as a million things raced through your head. You unchained your bike and quickly rode out of the school onto the busy streets of NYC, leaving Peter standing in front of the school, pulling at his hair.

-

-

-

You didn’t stop, you kept riding, you went straight, right, left, anywhere, anywhere that wasn’t there. You finally get to the edge of New York City. You were by the ocean, you don’t know which park this was, and you didn’t care. At least no one was here. You dropped your bike by the sand and sat down by the ocean . And you looked out.

The waves crashing down, as the wind breezed through your hair. The sun beating on your face. You lay your head back on the sand, as you closed your eyes soaking up the sun and its heat. You weren’t crying, you weren’t yelling, you weren’t feeling. Your closed. Your done.

You watched the sun set, admiring the beautiful colors in the sky. You forgot about time and day. You just watched the sun. That’s it. Nothing else was in your head, Just the sun. The sun now over the arisen, stars started to pop up in the sky and you focused on that then. You looked for the constellations that you remembered as a kid. Your dad use to take you to the roof of the Stark Tower, when it was the Stark Tower, and he would lay a blanket and you guys would just lay there finding constellations. It’s been years since you sat quietly and looked for constellations. You then fell asleep looking up at the night sky.

“Fuck. You.” you say. Staring the man dead in the eye. He goes for another punch, this time to the face. You take the hit and spit the blood out on the side. You were tied down to a chair, your wrists and legs bound to the chair, with the ‘handcuffs’. You couldn’t break from them no matter how much energy you tried to release, it wouldn’t d even let your fingertips heat up.

“This will keep going, the more you resist, the more you disobey, the more pain we’ll cause. Simple as that.” The man says, going over to the table behind him grabbing another tool. Hey presses it against your naked stomach, only wearing a bra and panties. You bit your lip in pain, not wanting him to feel the satisfaction in your cries, you smell the burning flesh and you can feel your skin bubbling. He retracks the tool, you breathe out, taking in deep breathes.

This wasn’t new for you, you acted out, you shouldn’t have, but you did. They killed your cell neighbor the only person you could take too at night. You guys spent the nights talking about your old lives. Even though there was a wall between you guys, you still cared about him. He was like an older brother to you, he usually stopped the guard’s from touching you. He got most of them away, but not all of them. At night a few guard’s would come into your cell and touch you, and sexually assault you. You would cry out in pain as Wade screamed from his cell for them to stop. His name was Wade Wilson, he made your days there better, with his funny as hell jokes and random commentary. The day they took him down to the basement and never returned him you knew what they did.    

The man placed the tool down and picked up the needle. Your eyes wide and you started to shake your head violently. They gave you those needles often, and they were the worst pain ever. “No, no please. Please, one more chance please just don’t-” before you could finish your sentence, the needle made contact with your skin, the blue liquid entering your bloodstream. The pain coursed through your body and your scream erupted.

Your body shots up, your hand coming to your chest feeling your heart beating at lighting speed. You look up to see the sun rising, you start taking deep breathes, focusing on the sun, trying to relax your mind. You rub your eyes, as you look around. There were a few people passing by staring at you, some taking pictures of Y/N Stark sleeping on the sand. You ignore it though, your eyes moving back to the sun.

You wait until the sun has fully risen, until you start to push yourself onto your feet. You pat some of the sand off you, as you pick your bike up, swinging your leg over the seat and start peddling. You pass by the cars, and yelling people making there way to work.

The Avenger’s compound then comes into view and you keep pedaling until you rest your bike against the wall and walk in. You kick your shoes off, you make your way to the comman area to get to your room. You find everyone suited up yelling at each other. You ignore it, you see your bag on the floor and go over to pick it up and you start to make your way to your room. No one seemed to notice you until

“She’s back.” Peter says, sighing in relief. Everyone turns around to see you walking away. Tony pushes through everyone and calls your name out.

“Y/N, Y/N!” but you continue to walk, not wanting to deal with this right now. “Y/N where were you! We were going to send out everyone to look for you! Hey!” Your eyes are focused on the hallway. You finally make it to your room and slam it shut, tapping the screen next to the door so the door locks. You hear your dads footsteps finally making it to your room. He goes to turn the knob to find it locked. “Y/N-Y/N! Open the door!” You drop your bag on the floor and look to your clock on 12:45pm. You make your way to the bathroom washing your face. You still hear the banging on your door and your dad calling your name from behind it.

Steve makes his way down the hall to see an angry Tony banging on your door, yelling your name. He comes over and places a hand on his shoulder. “Leave her. She’ll come out-” Tony cuts Steve off.

“No, she fucking disappeared from the school, she didn’t even come home. Where the fuck was she! For all I knew she could’ve been taken! S-she could’ve been l-lying dead somewhere.” Tony couldn’t even get the words out before a sob left his mouth. Steve looked at Tony, his heart shattering to a million pieces to see his friend in this state. The only person that could make him like this was you. He thought you were dead. Steve dragged Tony to his office, not wanting the rest of the team to see Tony like this. Tony went to his scotch pouring himself a drink and taking a swing. Steve let it happen, he knew Tony went through a lot today.

-

-

-

You went to your closet about two hours later, pulling on a pair of sports shorts, and sports bra and throwing a tank-top over it. You put your Nikes on and grab your gym bag as you leave your room. The compound was silent, but you didn’t care. Your face expressionless, your heart feeling cold as ice. You couldn’t feel anything. You made your way to the training room.

The training room was practically a gym, there was a huge mat placed at the center, where you guys often spared each other in. There were weights around the edge, and boxing bags lined in a row, there were other equipment as well. You go to the bleachers dropping your bag down and opening the bag. You take out your boxing tap and you start wrapping them around your hands.

“FRIDAY play my workout playlist.” You yell. FRIDAY plays the music, it echos through the gym walls. You tell FRIDAY to higher the volume, so that’s the only thing you could hear. You move to the boxing bag, and you start punching. Your punches becoming stronger with each throw, all the anger you kept in starting to leak out. And you let it.

Your hands starting to heat up and they started to glow, with one last punch you send the bag flying across the room. You move to grab another bag, hanging it up and continuing. You don’t know how long you’ve been in the training room, until you hear someone speak from behind you.

“Wanna talk about it.” Steve. You continue punching the bag.

“No- theres - nothing - too - talk - about!” The bag flies across the room. You go over and hang up another bag. Steve looks around the room noticing about twenty bags laying around the room. Steve knew you don’t like talking about shit like that so he did what he knew you’d agree on doing.

“Ok… how about we take break from boxing, and spare?” Your punches hesitated, knowing what he was trying to do. You continue punching the bag. “C’mon Y/N, me and you. You haven’t been on the field for awhile. Let’s see what you’ve got.” You stopped your punches holding the bag so it wouldn’t swing back and hit you. You turn around, Steve notices the anger in your eyes. He could see your hands balled in fists. He’s never seen you like this. And it scared him a little.

“And who’s fault is that, Huh?! Oh yea it was everyone’s ! All of you said I couldn’t go on missions anymore!” You unwrap the tape around your hands and throw them behind you, making your way to the mat, in the middle of the room. You stand in the middle putting your hands up in guard. “You wanna see what I’ve got, c’mon. I’m ready!” Steve hesitated a bit, this wasn’t such a good idea. When sparing, it’s usually hand to hand combat meaning no powers. Rules were don’t kill each other and if the other person says stop it’s over. Other than that, everything else is fine.

“Remember the rules?” Steve says making his way to you. He just wanted to make sure you weren’t going to kill him.

“Yes, I know the fucking rules!” You spat, annoyed with absolutely everything at this point. Steve brushed off your attitude and nodded his head. Steve stands in front of you putting his hands up in guard.

“Ok, lets go.” You were quick to through the first punch, which was not like you, you get Steve right in jaw. Steve hesitates a bit, taken aback by the sudden anger filling you. You and Steve go back an forth, Steve was mostly on defensive not wanting to hurt you when your in this state. People started coming into the room taking a seat on the bleachers. You caught a few people from the corner of your eye, Peter, Clint and Nat were sitting in the first row, Sam and Rhodey behind them, Wanda came in shortly after and not surprising Vision comes in behind her. You then notice Bucky enter , but ignore him, still annoyed about what he did. But you didn’t focus on them, it was only on Steve. The more punches and kicks you threw the more you grew angry. Your blood was boiling. When Steve makes you loose your balance, falling on your back, you let out a grunt. Steve jogs up to you ready to pick you up.

“Don’t touch me!” you say pushing his hands away and standing up quickly going back to guard. “Let’s go.” Steve looks at your fists, your nails digging into your palms. He shakes his head ‘no’. “What?!” You say frustrated. It was his damn idea.

“I’m done Y/N. Lets take a break-” You turn away from Steve and face the bleachers.

You raise your hands up, “Anyone care to spare!” You yell eyeing everyone. They all exchange looks, they could see your distressed figure, but if this was the only way you wanted to communicate then so be it. Sam was the first to stand up. He makes his way to you rolling up his sleeves. “Ok…Lets go” Steve nods at Sam, and you guys start fighting. You and Sam go back and forth for about thirty minutes, it was long. Until Sam notices how this wasn’t any good and you catch him off guard knocking him off his feet, his back hitting the floor. “C’mon, get up.” Sam rolls over standing back up.

“I’m done Y/N” you roll your eyes and turn back to the bleachers.

“Who’s next!” Clint stands up making his way to you. Clint often trained you, most of your fight combinations you learned were from him. You nod your head, Steve calls it and you guys start fighting. Every hit fueled your anger, every punch you threw was building up your anger and frustration. You just wanted to let go, but you couldn’t. You pushed through it, and kept fighting. Clint knocked you and you stubbled back, but not completely falling. Clint calls it though. Wanda takes his place. She then drops and Vision comes in. After Vision. Bucky then offers to fight. “No.” Everyone looks at you, you said you wanted to fight. You did but not Bucky. Bucky silently sat back down.

By the time you got to Nat, you wouldn’t even look anyone in the eye, your head feeling like it was going to explode. Your hands were up ready to start fighting Nat, but Steve quickly grabs your hands. You look up at him your eyebrows furrowed. “What?!” You say struggling to get out of his grip. 

“No. Powers.” He said, you look down at your hands, they were about to let an energy ball out. You nodd your head.

“Yea I know. Sorry. I’m fine. Let. go.” You say not loosing your stern voice. Steve lets go backing up. He yells start, Nat throws the first kick, and you guys fight. You always hated fighting Nat and Steve, they were always the hardest, and they fueled you up. they knocked you down and got you questioning every move, making you more and more angry. Nat knocks you to the floor for the sixth time, finally making it the last. “What?!” you say standing up wiping the faint blood trickling down your forehead.

“Your bleeding Y/N. I’m not gonna fight you. You need a break.” Nat says making her way to you, but you back up not letting her touch you. 

You scoff, “ I don’t need shit. If you don’t wanna fight get off the mat!” You spat turning your back and looking at the bleachers for what seemed like the thousandth time. “So! Who’s next!” you yelled annoyed that they haven’t gotten the message that someone has to be on the mat with her. 

“Me,” you look down seeing Peter making his way towards you. You square up on the mat. 

“Ok”, You don’t dare look Peter in the eye, avoiding his gaze at all costs. Steve calls it and you start. You throw a punch and kick missing both times, this went on for awhile, Peter didn’t get hit once and he didn’t dare hit you, not wanting to cause you any kind of pain. All he did was dodge and you were the one trying to get him. It was getting you more worked up. “Stop dodging! Fucking hit me Peter!” You yell, Peter ignores your request and continues dodging each punch and kick. Until you lost it. You didn’t know what came over you, it was like your breaking point and you couldn’t control it. The huge energy ball came out of nowhere hurdling towards Peter. Steve was quick to grab Nat and pull her down, everyone else dropped to the floor taking shelter. You looked up seeing a huge hole in the wall. “oh my god.” You ran towards the wall, looking through it, you got out walking outside to see pieces of the wall scattered around the field. You looked around for Peter. “PETER!” Your breathing quickened, you gasped for air. “PETER!” Before you knew it there was a tap on your shoulder and you wipe your head around and see Peters face. He sensed the energy ball coming towards him and he quickly latched on the ceiling dodging the energy. You threw yourself at Peter. “I’m sorry, Peter I’m so so sorry, oh my god-” Peter wrapped on arm around your waist and the other stroked your hair as you held him with your life. 

“I’m fine Y/N, I’m fine.” You pulled away, you felt the tears prickling your eyes. NO YOU CAN’T LET GO YOU CAN’T! You looked at Peter, he noticed your glassy eyes. He brought one hand up to your cheek. “I’m okay Y/N” he said softly, with a reassuring smile. And thats when you lost it, your body fell numb as your body collapsed, Peter wrapped his hand around your waist and fell to the ground with you. He hugged you on the ground as you let go. Your tears soaked up his shirt. 

“I-I can’t, I can’t, I-It hurts Peter. It hurts so bad.” You sobbed, as all the feelings you kept locked up for the past five years came out. The tears ran down your face like a waterfall, it wouldn’t stop. And you felt a weight being lifted off your shoulder. Peter stroked your back and just brought you closer to his body. “P-peter, Im so sorry. I-I can’t” You soaked up in his shirt, grabbing everything he was giving you. 

“I-It’s okay Y/N,” He kissed the side of your head. You couldn’t breathe, you pulled back trying to gasp for hair. Peters hand flys up to your face, stroking your cheek bones. He looks You in the eye and says “Let it go,” and thats exactly what you did. You yelled out in pain as Peter held you close. The rest of the team watched from afar, they held each other watching you cry on Peters shoulder. All there hearts breaking at the amount of pain you’ve kept in, a 16 year old girl, there 16 year old girl should not be holding that much pain and that’s when they finally realized everything you’ve went through. Nat and Wanda were silently crying as the guys choked back there tears. Peter soon started to feel the tears running down his cheeks. He continued to hold you as you felt the world beating you down. 

After what seemed like a hours, everyone had gone inside awhile ago giving you space. You were just breathing heavy, having felt like you had no more tears to let out. Your eyes were red and puffy. Your head rested on Peters shoulder, your body in a tight ball on Peters lap. You soon fell asleep on his shoulder. It was already night time, so Peter picks you up and makes his way to your room. He passes by the team, Steve was talking to Tony, when Tony’s eye caught your torn down body in Peter’s arms. Peter could tell Tony had been crying… and drinking for awhile. The team noticed your sleeping figure and didn’t dare make a sound. Except for Tony, he made his way to Peter, he halted his stance, no letting go of you, afraid to wake you up. Tony stood in front of Peter, looking down at his daughter. He pushed a few strands of hair from your face, placing a kiss on your forehead, before stepping out of the way, nodding to Peter. 

Peter carefully placed you on your bed, he tucked you under the blankets. Before he could walk away from the bed you grabbed his wrist. He looks down at you, “Stay.” you say weakly. Peter gives you a soft smile nodding his head. You slide over, making room for Peter. Peter pulls the blanket above both your bodies. You slide closer to him resting you head on his chest, taking in his scent. Peter wrapped his arm around your waist pulling you closer. You let out a sigh and fall into a deep sleep. Peter rubs small circles on your waist until he too falls asleep.  

-

-

-

Warning: language, anxiety, violence, sexual assault

“FRIDAY play my workout playlist.” You yell. FRIDAY plays the music, it echos through the gym walls. You tell FRIDAY to higher the volume, so that’s the only thing you could hear. You move to the boxing bag, and you start punching. Your punches becoming stronger with each throw, all the anger you kept in starting to leak out. And you let it.

Your hands starting to heat up and they started to glow, with one last punch you send the bag flying across the room. You move to grab another bag, hanging it up and continuing. You don’t know how long you’ve been in the training room, until you hear someone speak from behind you.

“Wanna talk about it.” Steve. You continue punching the bag.

“No- theres - nothing - too - talk - about!” The bag flies across the room. You go over and hang up another bag. Steve looks around the room noticing about twenty bags laying around the room. Steve knew you don’t like talking about shit like that so he did what he knew you’d agree on doing.

“Ok… how about we take break from boxing, and spare?” Your punches hesitated, knowing what he was trying to do. You continue punching the bag. “C’mon Y/N, me and you. You haven’t been on the field for awhile. Let’s see what you’ve got.” You stopped your punches holding the bag so it wouldn’t swing back and hit you. You turn around, Steve notices the anger in your eyes. He could see your hands balled in fists. He’s never seen you like this. And it scared him a little.

“And who’s fault is that, Huh?! Oh yea it was everyone’s ! All of you said I couldn’t go on missions anymore!” You unwrap the tape around your hands and throw them behind you, making your way to the mat, in the middle of the room. You stand in the middle putting your hands up in guard. “You wanna see what I’ve got, c’mon. I’m ready!” Steve hesitated a bit, this wasn’t such a good idea. When sparing, it’s usually hand to hand combat meaning no powers. Rules were don’t kill each other and if the other person says stop it’s over. Other than that, everything else is fine.

“Remember the rules?” Steve says making his way to you. He just wanted to make sure you weren’t going to kill him.

“Yes, I know the fucking rules!” You spat, annoyed with absolutely everything at this point. Steve brushed off your attitude and nodded his head. Steve stands in front of you putting his hands up in guard.

“Ok, lets go.” You were quick to through the first punch, which was not like you, you get Steve right in jaw. Steve hesitates a bit, taken aback by the sudden anger filling you. You and Steve go back an forth, Steve was mostly on defensive not wanting to hurt you when your in this state. People started coming into the room taking a seat on the bleachers. You caught a few people from the corner of your eye, Peter, Clint and Nat were sitting in the first row, Sam and Rhodey behind them, Wanda came in shortly after and not surprising Vision comes in behind her. You then notice Bucky enter , but ignore him, still annoyed about what he did. But you didn’t focus on them, it was only on Steve. The more punches and kicks you threw the more you grew angry. Your blood was boiling. When Steve makes you loose your balance, falling on your back, you let out a grunt. Steve jogs up to you ready to pick you up.

“Don’t touch me!” you say pushing his hands away and standing up quickly going back to guard. “Let’s go.” Steve looks at your fists, your nails digging into your palms. He shakes his head ‘no’. “What?!” You say frustrated. It was his damn idea.

“I’m done Y/N. Lets take a break-” You turn away from Steve and face the bleachers.

You raise your hands up, “Anyone care to spare!” You yell eyeing everyone. They all exchange looks, they could see your distressed figure, but if this was the only way you wanted to communicate then so be it. Sam was the first to stand up. He makes his way to you rolling up his sleeves. “Ok…Lets go” Steve nods at Sam, and you guys start fighting. You and Sam go back and forth for about thirty minutes, it was long. Until Sam notices how this wasn’t any good and you catch him off guard knocking him off his feet, his back hitting the floor. “C’mon, get up.” Sam rolls over standing back up.

“I’m done Y/N” you roll your eyes and turn back to the bleachers.

“Who’s next!” Clint stands up making his way to you. Clint often trained you, most of your fight combinations you learned were from him. You nod your head, Steve calls it and you guys start fighting. Every hit fueled your anger, every punch you threw was building up your anger and frustration. You just wanted to let go, but you couldn’t. You pushed through it, and kept fighting. Clint knocked you and you stubbled back, but not completely falling. Clint calls it though. Wanda takes his place. She then drops and Vision comes in. After Vision. Bucky then offers to fight. “No.” Everyone looks at you, you said you wanted to fight. You did but not Bucky. Bucky silently sat back down.

By the time you got to Nat, you wouldn’t even look anyone in the eye, your head feeling like it was going to explode. Your hands were up ready to start fighting Nat, but Steve quickly grabs your hands. You look up at him your eyebrows furrowed. “What?!” You say struggling to get out of his grip. 

“No. Powers.” He said, you look down at your hands, they were about to let an energy ball out. You nodd your head.

“Yea I know. Sorry. I’m fine. Let. go.” You say not loosing your stern voice. Steve lets go backing up. He yells start, Nat throws the first kick, and you guys fight. You always hated fighting Nat and Steve, they were always the hardest, and they fueled you up. they knocked you down and got you questioning every move, making you more and more angry. Nat knocks you to the floor for the sixth time, finally making it the last. “What?!” you say standing up wiping the faint blood trickling down your forehead.

“Your bleeding Y/N. I’m not gonna fight you. You need a break.” Nat says making her way to you, but you back up not letting her touch you. 

You scoff, “ I don’t need shit. If you don’t wanna fight get off the mat!” You spat turning your back and looking at the bleachers for what seemed like the thousandth time. “So! Who’s next!” you yelled annoyed that they haven’t gotten the message that someone has to be on the mat with her. 

“Me,” you look down seeing Peter making his way towards you. You square up on the mat. 

“Ok”, You don’t dare look Peter in the eye, avoiding his gaze at all costs. Steve calls it and you start. You throw a punch and kick missing both times, this went on for awhile, Peter didn’t get hit once and he didn’t dare hit you, not wanting to cause you any kind of pain. All he did was dodge and you were the one trying to get him. It was getting you more worked up. “Stop dodging! Fucking hit me Peter!” You yell, Peter ignores your request and continues dodging each punch and kick. Until you lost it. You didn’t know what came over you, it was like your breaking point and you couldn’t control it. The huge energy ball came out of nowhere hurdling towards Peter. Steve was quick to grab Nat and pull her down, everyone else dropped to the floor taking shelter. You looked up seeing a huge hole in the wall. “oh my god.” You ran towards the wall, looking through it, you got out walking outside to see pieces of the wall scattered around the field. You looked around for Peter. “PETER!” Your breathing quickened, you gasped for air. “PETER!” Before you knew it there was a tap on your shoulder and you wipe your head around and see Peters face. He sensed the energy ball coming towards him and he quickly latched on the ceiling dodging the energy. You threw yourself at Peter. “I’m sorry, Peter I’m so so sorry, oh my god-” Peter wrapped on arm around your waist and the other stroked your hair as you held him with your life. 

“I’m fine Y/N, I’m fine.” You pulled away, you felt the tears prickling your eyes. NO YOU CAN’T LET GO YOU CAN’T! You looked at Peter, he noticed your glassy eyes. He brought one hand up to your cheek. “I’m okay Y/N” he said softly, with a reassuring smile. And thats when you lost it, your body fell numb as your body collapsed, Peter wrapped his hand around your waist and fell to the ground with you. He hugged you on the ground as you let go. Your tears soaked up his shirt. 

“I-I can’t, I can’t, I-It hurts Peter. It hurts so bad.” You sobbed, as all the feelings you kept locked up for the past five years came out. The tears ran down your face like a waterfall, it wouldn’t stop. And you felt a weight being lifted off your shoulder. Peter stroked your back and just brought you closer to his body. “P-peter, Im so sorry. I-I can’t” You soaked up in his shirt, grabbing everything he was giving you. 

“I-It’s okay Y/N,” He kissed the side of your head. You couldn’t breathe, you pulled back trying to gasp for hair. Peters hand flys up to your face, stroking your cheek bones. He looks You in the eye and says “Let it go,” and thats exactly what you did. You yelled out in pain as Peter held you close. The rest of the team watched from afar, they held each other watching you cry on Peters shoulder. All there hearts breaking at the amount of pain you’ve kept in, a 16 year old girl, there 16 year old girl should not be holding that much pain and that’s when they finally realized everything you’ve went through. Nat and Wanda were silently crying as the guys choked back there tears. Peter soon started to feel the tears running down his cheeks. He continued to hold you as you felt the world beating you down. 

After what seemed like a hours, everyone had gone inside awhile ago giving you space. You were just breathing heavy, having felt like you had no more tears to let out. Your eyes were red and puffy. Your head rested on Peters shoulder, your body in a tight ball on Peters lap. You soon fell asleep on his shoulder. It was already night time, so Peter picks you up and makes his way to your room. He passes by the team, Steve was talking to Tony, when Tony’s eye caught your torn down body in Peter’s arms. Peter could tell Tony had been crying… and drinking for awhile. The team noticed your sleeping figure and didn’t dare make a sound. Except for Tony, he made his way to Peter, he halted his stance, no letting go of you, afraid to wake you up. Tony stood in front of Peter, looking down at his daughter. He pushed a few strands of hair from your face, placing a kiss on your forehead, before stepping out of the way, nodding to Peter. 

Peter carefully placed you on your bed, he tucked you under the blankets. Before he could walk away from the bed you grabbed his wrist. He looks down at you, “Stay.” you say weakly. Peter gives you a soft smile nodding his head. You slide over, making room for Peter. Peter pulls the blanket above both your bodies. You slide closer to him resting you head on his chest, taking in his scent. Peter wrapped his arm around your waist pulling you closer. You let out a sigh and fall into a deep sleep. Peter rubs small circles on your waist until he too falls asleep.  

-

-

-

Part 9 coming soon!
trail.content:
Finally Found My Way

Part 8

Warning: language, anxiety, violence, sexual assault

Summary: After four years of being tortured by hydra, you were finally back, yours powers stronger than ever. But that was not all.

Word Count: 4.3K

Josh was the only thing you were looking forward too when you woke up. Ever since your date, Josh has been doing something new with you everyday. You were mad a Bucky though. He refused to let you come along on missions, he even convinced the rest of the team somehow to agree on this. Even Peter! You were tired of this and spent most of your time with Josh instead.

Bucky ended up telling the team about the nightmares. Tony had the worst reaction, he isolated himself for two days, destroyed his room in the process. How could he not have seen this. He was your father, how could he have missed this. But Natasha helped him get through it telling him not to comfort you, knowing you would push them away if they did. Steve was in shock, he knew it happened ONCE, you told him it only happened once and they stopped. You told him. He should’ve pushed up to tell him, he should’ve done more. Clint and Bruce couldn’t even process the information. Wanda cried, Vision held her. Sam was broken. Everyone knew, but no one could do anything.

Three weeks. Three weeks since you’ve been on a mission but also three weeks you and Josh have been dating . And it was amazing. He held your hand in the hallways, kissed you by the lockers, walked you to every class, took you to lunch after school, if you weren’t busy, and he would make you feel so special.

That was until he started becoming a little distant, it was Wednesday, and he barely talked to you after you guys hung out Sunday. He said he was busy. You were fine. Everything was fine. You know not to get attached to things, especially people. You hadn’t fully trusted Josh and he hasn’t fully trusted you so it’s fine to have too spend some days just for yourself. That was until Wednesday in the cafeteria. You were talking to Mj and Ned who were sitting on either side of you, Flash and Peter were talking about the Spanish quiz tomorrow, they were sitting in front of you.

“You guys wanna do a Star Wars marathon this Friday?” Ned asked with a huge smile.

“Sure, I’m free.” MJ says, then looking at you , so you could respond.

“I’m pretty sure I’m free too.” You say, you loved spending time with your friends.  You turn to Peter and Flash. “You guys in?” They weren’t looking at you, and they weren’t talking, they were actually staring in shock at what was behind you. Ned turns behind to see what was happening and quickly looks between Peter and Flash. They both shake there heads ‘no’. “What’s wrong?” You say turning to see what they were looking at. But before you could see anything, Peter jumps over the table standing in front of you, so you could only see his chest. “What’s up Peter, move.” You were annoyed and confused at why he suddenly moved to block your path. You stand up, trying to get Peter to move. It was getting annoying. “Peter, what the fuck, just move.” Flash comes by Peter holding your shoulders.

“Y/N, it-its not a big deal.” Flash says, sadness covered his face and so did Peter’s face.

“If it’s not a big deal then why can’t I see.” Peter and Flash both stood side by side blocking your view. That’s it, you pushed both of them to the side, using a little force from your powers, (the energy in your powers could make you stronger when you wanted too). But you instantly regretted it. There he was. Josh, his hands around another girls shoulder, they were making out, for a long time. The whole entire cafeteria fell silent, when they saw Y/N Stark standing in shock with her two friends not knowing what to do. The silence caught Josh’s attention, he made eye contact with you. You didn’t know what you were feeling. You could feel the heat rising in your hands. Peter saw you tense, and he looked down at your hands, they were starting to light up. He quickly moved past Flash, taking your hands in his. You didn’t move. Your eyes were still locked on Josh’s. Josh was frozen. He knew he fucked up big time. He got out of his table and started walking towards you.

“Y/N, its-its not what it looks like, let me explain-” He was about to reach for your shoulder, but Peter was quick to turn around and punch him. knocking him to the floor as he grabbed his eye. Peter was going to go for another punch until he felt Flash holding him back.

“Not here man- not here.” Flash whispers to Peter, pushing him back to you. You still hadn’t moved. You were still trying to figure out what your were feeling. Peter on the other hand knew exactly what he felt, anger. He knew this would happen, he knew Josh wouldn’t treat you like you wanted him too. He could feel his blood boiling. When he saw Josh standing up and making his way to him, Peter was just about ready to kill the guy until Flash stepped in. He pushed Josh back. “Get the fuck away from here, before you start something you regret dumbass.” Flash pushes Josh back. Peter was standing in front of you, Flash was defending you, Mj was holding your hand and Ned was rubbing your back, the cafeteria was staring, some people were even filming it. It was too much. That’s one thing you knew. You can’t be here. You can’t be here.

You push past everyone heading for the door leaving your bag and phone and everything, your only focus was on getting out of there. You ran down the hall, pushing the schools front doors open as Peter chased you down the hall, calling your name. But you ignored it, the sound muffled as a million things raced through your head. You unchained your bike and quickly rode out of the school onto the busy streets of NYC, leaving Peter standing in front of the school, pulling at his hair.

-

-

-

You didn’t stop, you kept riding, you went straight, right, left, anywhere, anywhere that wasn’t there. You finally get to the edge of New York City. You were by the ocean, you don’t know which park this was, and you didn’t care. At least no one was here. You dropped your bike by the sand and sat down by the ocean . And you looked out.

The waves crashing down, as the wind breezed through your hair. The sun beating on your face. You lay your head back on the sand, as you closed your eyes soaking up the sun and its heat. You weren’t crying, you weren’t yelling, you weren’t feeling. Your closed. Your done.

You watched the sun set, admiring the beautiful colors in the sky. You forgot about time and day. You just watched the sun. That’s it. Nothing else was in your head, Just the sun. The sun now over the arisen, stars started to pop up in the sky and you focused on that then. You looked for the constellations that you remembered as a kid. Your dad use to take you to the roof of the Stark Tower, when it was the Stark Tower, and he would lay a blanket and you guys would just lay there finding constellations. It’s been years since you sat quietly and looked for constellations. You then fell asleep looking up at the night sky.

“Fuck. You.” you say. Staring the man dead in the eye. He goes for another punch, this time to the face. You take the hit and spit the blood out on the side. You were tied down to a chair, your wrists and legs bound to the chair, with the ‘handcuffs’. You couldn’t break from them no matter how much energy you tried to release, it wouldn’t d even let your fingertips heat up.

“This will keep going, the more you resist, the more you disobey, the more pain we’ll cause. Simple as that.” The man says, going over to the table behind him grabbing another tool. Hey presses it against your naked stomach, only wearing a bra and panties. You bit your lip in pain, not wanting him to feel the satisfaction in your cries, you smell the burning flesh and you can feel your skin bubbling. He retracks the tool, you breathe out, taking in deep breathes.

This wasn’t new for you, you acted out, you shouldn’t have, but you did. They killed your cell neighbor the only person you could take too at night. You guys spent the nights talking about your old lives. Even though there was a wall between you guys, you still cared about him. He was like an older brother to you, he usually stopped the guard’s from touching you. He got most of them away, but not all of them. At night a few guard’s would come into your cell and touch you, and sexually assault you. You would cry out in pain as Wade screamed from his cell for them to stop. His name was Wade Wilson, he made your days there better, with his funny as hell jokes and random commentary. The day they took him down to the basement and never returned him you knew what they did.    

The man placed the tool down and picked up the needle. Your eyes wide and you started to shake your head violently. They gave you those needles often, and they were the worst pain ever. “No, no please. Please, one more chance please just don’t-” before you could finish your sentence, the needle made contact with your skin, the blue liquid entering your bloodstream. The pain coursed through your body and your scream erupted.

Your body shots up, your hand coming to your chest feeling your heart beating at lighting speed. You look up to see the sun rising, you start taking deep breathes, focusing on the sun, trying to relax your mind. You rub your eyes, as you look around. There were a few people passing by staring at you, some taking pictures of Y/N Stark sleeping on the sand. You ignore it though, your eyes moving back to the sun.

You wait until the sun has fully risen, until you start to push yourself onto your feet. You pat some of the sand off you, as you pick your bike up, swinging your leg over the seat and start peddling. You pass by the cars, and yelling people making there way to work.

The Avenger’s compound then comes into view and you keep pedaling until you rest your bike against the wall and walk in. You kick your shoes off, you make your way to the comman area to get to your room. You find everyone suited up yelling at each other. You ignore it, you see your bag on the floor and go over to pick it up and you start to make your way to your room. No one seemed to notice you until

“She’s back.” Peter says, sighing in relief. Everyone turns around to see you walking away. Tony pushes through everyone and calls your name out.

“Y/N, Y/N!” but you continue to walk, not wanting to deal with this right now. “Y/N where were you! We were going to send out everyone to look for you! Hey!” Your eyes are focused on the hallway. You finally make it to your room and slam it shut, tapping the screen next to the door so the door locks. You hear your dads footsteps finally making it to your room. He goes to turn the knob to find it locked. “Y/N-Y/N! Open the door!” You drop your bag on the floor and look to your clock on 12:45pm. You make your way to the bathroom washing your face. You still hear the banging on your door and your dad calling your name from behind it.

Steve makes his way down the hall to see an angry Tony banging on your door, yelling your name. He comes over and places a hand on his shoulder. “Leave her. She’ll come out-” Tony cuts Steve off.

“No, she fucking disappeared from the school, she didn’t even come home. Where the fuck was she! For all I knew she could’ve been taken! S-she could’ve been l-lying dead somewhere.” Tony couldn’t even get the words out before a sob left his mouth. Steve looked at Tony, his heart shattering to a million pieces to see his friend in this state. The only person that could make him like this was you. He thought you were dead. Steve dragged Tony to his office, not wanting the rest of the team to see Tony like this. Tony went to his scotch pouring himself a drink and taking a swing. Steve let it happen, he knew Tony went through a lot today.

-

-

-

You went to your closet about two hours later, pulling on a pair of sports shorts, and sports bra and throwing a tank-top over it. You put your Nikes on and grab your gym bag as you leave your room. The compound was silent, but you didn’t care. Your face expressionless, your heart feeling cold as ice. You couldn’t feel anything. You made your way to the training room.

Your tears soaked up his shirt.

The tears ran down your face like a waterfall, it wouldn’t stop. And you felt a weight being lifted off your shoulder. Peter stroked your back and just brought you closer to his body. “P-peter, Im so sorry. I-I can’t” You soaked up in his shirt, grabbing everything he was giving you.

He looks You in the eye and says “Let it go,” and thats exactly what you did. You yelled out in pain as Peter held you close. Nat and Wanda were silently crying as the guys choked back there tears. Peter soon started to feel the tears running down his cheeks. He continued to hold you as you felt the world beating you down.

Your head rested on Peters shoulder, your body in a tight ball on Peters lap. You soon fell asleep on his shoulder. It was already night time, so Peter picks you up and makes his way to your room. He passes by the team, Steve was talking to Tony, when Tony’s eye caught your torn down body in Peter’s arms. Peter could tell Tony had been crying… and drinking for awhile. The team noticed your sleeping figure and didn’t dare make a sound. Except for Tony, he made his way to Peter, he halted his stance, no letting go of you, afraid to wake you up. Peter carefully placed you on your bed, he tucked you under the blankets. Before he could walk away from the bed you grabbed his wrist. He looks down at you, “Stay.” you say weakly. Peter gives you a soft smile nodding his head. You slide over, making room for Peter. Peter pulls the blanket above both your bodies. You slide closer to him resting you head on his chest, taking in his scent. Peter wrapped his arm around your waist pulling you closer. You let out a sigh and fall into a deep sleep. Peter rubs small circles on your waist until he too falls asleep.
